content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great place to live, being so centrally located with all the amenities you need nearby. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I believe the market value for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center is around 800 Euro per month. However, I am a student and I'm looking to negotiate the best price possible. I'm smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I'm also keen to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. Could we possibly start at 750 Euro per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your honesty and your approach to negotiations. While 750 Euro may be a fair price for an apartment of this size and location, I must confess that I am looking to maximize the rent for this property. It's a new construction, and I believe the market can bear a higher price. How does 900 Euro sound to you? It's a fair reflection of the value of the apartment, and I'm sure you'll agree it's a great deal for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your perspective. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget, and I'm looking to secure the best deal possible. 900 Euro per month is quite steep for me. Could we perhaps find a middle ground? How about 825 Euro per month? I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the market value and my financial situation.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. 825 Euro does sound like a reasonable compromise. However, as a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. Would you be willing to go just a bit higher, say 850 Euro per month? This would still be a great deal for you, considering the prime location and amenities. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, you make a compelling argument. I'm willing to come up to 850 Euro per month, as it's a fair reflection of the apartment's value and my budget can stretch that far. I believe this is a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you be willing to accept 850 Euro per month as the rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm glad to hear that you're willing to meet me at 850 Euro per month. This is indeed a fair price for both parties. I agree to the price of 850 Euro! Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I'm very pleased to have reached an agreement with you. I agree to the price of 850 Euro per month, and I look forward to signing the lease agreement. Thank you for your time and for offering me this great apartment. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
